events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit as expected. I would like to request a refund for this order as soon as possible.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request to get their money back for the item.
A customer service agent specialized in refund processing has been assigned to handle the case promptly and ensure a smooth resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to assist you with the refund process and make it as easy as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item has been returned or if you need instructions on how to return it?
The order number is 123456789. I havenâ€™t returned the jacket yet, so I would appreciate if you could tell me the return process.
Thank you for the details. I have emailed you the prepaid return shipping label along with instructions on how to pack and send the jacket back to us.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back within the next two days as instructed.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should be reflected on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can help you with today.
As there have been no further replies, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out and please contact us again if needed.
